publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-368# John Swinburne: National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People-That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of affordable public transport to the quality of life of older people in every part of Scotland and believes that the Scottish Executive should introduce a national concessionary travel scheme which includes bus, rail, ferry and air services.
S2M-368# National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People (lodged on 19 September 2003) Christine Grahame*, Carolyn Leckie*, Shiona Baird*, Alex Neil*
S2M-368# National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People (lodged on 19 September 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Frances Curran*, Colin Fox*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*, Robin Harper*
S2M-368# National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People (lodged on 19 September 2003) Dennis Canavan*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-368# National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People (lodged on 19 September 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-368# National Concessionary Travel Scheme for Older People (lodged on 19 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
